alert.note: Alert for Christian; Greene; Stone (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 29 at 4:32PM CDT until August 29 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR NORTHWESTERN CHRISTIAN, SOUTHEASTERN GREENE AND NORTHERN STONE COUNTIES... At 432 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 1 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Southeastern Springfield, Nixa, Ozark, Highlandville, Clever, Crane, Billings and Fremont Hills. This includes the following low water crossings... Dry Crane Creek at Jasmine Road, Green Valley Creek at Holder RD, Wilson`s Creek at Old Limey Road, Tin Can Hollow at Highway CC and Little Crane Creek at Old Wire Road. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles.
